title: 1.4.4forge问题
author: islandsman
txt_content:
1.4.4出来了然后看到forge也出来了于是就下载了,安装完却无法启动游戏,是FML的fatal error
错误报告是这样的:
2012-11-15 15:32:17 [INFO] [ForgeModLoader] Forge Mod Loader version 4.4.4.442 for Minecraft 1.4.4 loading
2012-11-15 15:32:17 [FINEST] [ForgeModLoader] All core mods are successfully located
2012-11-15 15:32:17 [FINEST] [ForgeModLoader] Discovering coremods
2012-11-15 15:32:17 [FINEST] [ForgeModLoader] Found library file argo-2.25.jar present and correct in lib dir
2012-11-15 15:32:17 [FINEST] [ForgeModLoader] Downloading file http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/guava-12.0.1.jar
2012-11-15 15:32:17 [INFO] [ForgeModLoader] Downloading file http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/guava-12.0.1.jar
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] There was a problem downloading the file guava-12.0.1.jar automatically. Perhaps you have an environment without internet access. You will need to download the file manually or restart and let it try again

2012-11-15 15:32:29 [FINEST] [ForgeModLoader] Found library file asm-all-4.0.jar present and correct in lib dir
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] There were errors during initial FML setup. Some files failed to download or were otherwise corrupted. You will need to manually obtain the following files from these download links and ensure your lib directory is clean. 
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] *** Download http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/argo-2.25.jar
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] *** Download http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/guava-12.0.1.jar
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] *** Download http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/asm-all-4.0.jar
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] <===========>
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] The following is the errors that caused the setup to fail. They may help you diagnose and resolve the issue
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] A download error occured
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] <<< ==== >>>
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] The following is diagnostic information for developers to review.
2012-11-15 15:32:29 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] Error details
java.lang.RuntimeException: A download error occured
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.RelaunchLibraryManager.downloadFile(RelaunchLibraryManager.java:482)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.RelaunchLibraryManager.handleLaunch(RelaunchLibraryManager.java:131)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLRelauncher.setupHome(FMLRelauncher.java:155)

        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLRelauncher.handleClientRelaunch(FMLRelauncher.java:26)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.main(Minecraft.java:2219)
Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: files.minecraftforge.net
        at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)

        ... 5 more
Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: files.minecraftforge.net
        at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)

        at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)

        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.RelaunchLibraryManager.downloadFile(RelaunchLibraryManager.java:465)
        ... 5 more
2012-11-15 15:32:36 [INFO] [STDERR] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: A fatal error occured and FML cannot continue
2012-11-15 15:32:36 [INFO] [STDERR]         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLRelauncher.setupHome(FMLRelauncher.java:175)
2012-11-15 15:32:36 [INFO] [STDERR]         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLRelauncher.relaunchClient(FMLRelauncher.java:92)

2012-11-15 15:32:36 [INFO] [STDERR]         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.RelaunchLibraryManager.handleLaunch(RelaunchLibraryManager.java:227)
2012-11-15 15:32:36 [INFO] [STDERR]         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLRelauncher.setupHome(FMLRelauncher.java:155)
2012-11-15 15:32:36 [INFO] [STDERR]         ... 3 more


似乎不是本机问题的样子?那该怎么解决?
求各位大大解答..

replies.author: comeheres
replies.txt_content: 看看.minecraft文件夹下的Lib文件夹里有没有argo-2.25.jar、guava-12.0.1.jar、asm-all-4.0.jar这三个文件，若没有，从其他地方复制过来就行
